raw_infobox.name: LeBron James
raw_infobox.alt: Full-body shot of LeBron James dribbling. He is a tall, black man with a buzz cut and a full beard. He is wearing a white jersey from the Los Angeles Lakers with the number 23.
raw_infobox.caption: James with the Los Angeles Lakers in 2023
raw_infobox.high_school: St. Vincent–St. Mary High School {{nowrap|(Akron, Ohio)}}
raw_infobox.highlights:
* 4× List of NBA champions (2012 NBA Finals, 2013 NBA Finals, 2016 NBA Finals, 2020 NBA Finals)
* 4× NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award (2012 NBA Finals, 2013 NBA Finals, 2016 NBA Finals, 2020 NBA Finals)
* 4× NBA Most Valuable Player Award (2008, 2009, 2011, 2012)
* 21× List of NBA All-Stars (2005–2025)
* 3× NBA All-Star Game Kobe Bryant Most Valuable Player Award (2006 NBA All-Star Game, 2008 NBA All-Star Game, 2018 NBA All-Star Game)
* 13× All-NBA Team (2005, 2007–2017, 2019)
* 4× All-NBA Team (2004, 2006, 2020, 2024)
* 4× All-NBA Team (2018, 2021–2023)
* 5× NBA All-Defensive Team (2008–2012)
* NBA All-Defensive Team (2013)
* NBA Rookie of the Year Award (2003)
* NBA All-Rookie First Team (2003)
* List of National Basketball Association annual scoring leaders (2007)
* NBA annual assists leader (2019)
* List of NBA Cup champions (2023 NBA In-Season Tournament championship game)
* List of NBA Cup champions (2023 NBA In-Season Tournament championship game)
* NBA 75th Anniversary Team
* FIBA Men's Olympics Most Valuable Player (Basketball at the 2024 Summer Olympics – Men's tournament)
* Associated Press Athlete of the Year (2010s)
* 4× Associated Press Athlete of the Year (2013, 2016, 2018, 2020)
* 3× Sports Illustrated Sportsperson of the Year (2012, 2016, 2020)
* USA Basketball Male Athlete of the Year (2012)
* 2× List of U.S. high school basketball national player of the year awards  (2002, 2003)
* McDonald's All-American Game (2003 McDonald's All-American Boys Game)
* 2× First-team Parade All-America Boys Basketball Team (2002, 2003)
* Second-team ''Parade'' All-American (2001)
* 3× Ohio Mr. Basketball (2001–2003)

personal_info.high_school: St. Vincent–St. Mary High School {{nowrap|(Akron, Ohio)}}
